description: TRUE HERO The delightful aroma of basmati rice and its light, fluffy texture when cooked make it a favourite for the whole family. Best of all, the grains remain separate.
name: Cashew & Coconut Chicken Curry With Spiced Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 pkt chicken thigh fillets, cut into 4cm pieces
0.25 bunch coriander, leaves picked, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1tbs ghee in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and spices, then cook for 5 minutes, stirring, or until onion has softened. Add rice and stir until well coated in ghee. Add stock and stir to combine. Bring to the boil over high heat. Cover and reduce heat to medium. Cook for 13 minutes without lifting the lid. Remove pan from heat and stand, covered, for 5 minutes. Fluff up rice with a fork.

Meanwhile, heat 2 tsp ghee in a large saucepan over high heat. Add half of the chicken and cook for 5 minutes, stirring, or until browned. Transfer to a plate. Repeat with 2 tsp ghee and chicken. Return chicken to pan with sauce, then bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium low and simmer, covered, for 15 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
Divide spiced rice, chicken curry and broccolini among plates. Serve scattered with cashews and coriander.
